```{r}
#| label: minimal-working-example
#| echo: true

library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

# Sample data frame
my_df <- data.frame(
  ID = 1:2,
  Value = c(10, 20)
)

# Column names with LaTeX math
my_colnames <- c("ID", "$\\hat{\\sigma}^2$")

# Create the table
knitr::kable(
  my_df,
  caption = "Correctly Rendered LaTeX in HTML",
  col.names = my_colnames,
  align = "r",
  # Step 1: Tell kable to make an HTML table
  format = "html",
  # Step 2: Tell kable NOT to escape special LaTeX characters
  escape = FALSE
) %>%
  # Step 3: Add styling with kableExtra
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped")
```
